data.title: The Carolyn Jackson Collection, no. 57
data.meta_description: Austin television personality Carolyn Jackson discusses The French Connection II with its director John Frankenheimer. The two talk about the differences between The French Connection II and its prequel, and how it stands on its own merits, and should be enjoyable even to those who haven't seen the first film. Frankenheimer describes at length working with special effects man Logan Frazee and the talents of legendary actor Gene Hackman.
data.meta_site_name: The Film and Video Archive of Texas
